column2: Chopped Brisket: They ran out of sliced brisket
column3: so I ordered the Chopped Brisket meal and it came with 2 sides + coleslaw. A mound of Chopped brisket placed on my tray looked like a challenge to eat and I barely finished it. The charred flavors was just the right touch and the sauce in the meat was just enough. They do provide extra sauce and if you want
